examples: You felt to some extent a bit ostracized in this group of older white men.

examples: The dancer's performance was so mesmerizing that she left her rivals standing and won the competition with ease.

It's mesmerizing.
It's just mesmerizing.
I, me, I was mesmerized by the tea set, immediately.
words.defineEn: to capture someone's attention and interest completely, in a way that they forget about everything else

One early leader who helped enfranchise women was teacher and library founder Elizabeth Ensley.

examples: For instance, quartz crystallizes at a relatively low pressure and temperature, while olivine forms only under extreme conditions.

examples: Susan struggled for years to achieve her dreams but she persevered, knowing that a gem is not polished without rubbing, nor a man perfected without trials.
No matter what happens, we will stand fast and persevere through the difficult times.
Despite facing criticism and doubt from his peers, the young inventor persevered and ultimately succeeded in creating a groundbreaking new technology - he who laughs last laughs loudest.

The student struggled with a challenging book, but knew that every book must be chewed to get out its juice - it was essential to persevere and put in the effort to understand and appreciate the text.
The boy learned if he hangs in there, perseveres, he can get the job done.
words.defineEn: to persistently try to succeed in spite of difficulties
words.defineVi: kiên trì cố gắng để thành công bất chấp khó khăn
nguyên nhân để trở nên khập khiễng

words.defineVi: bán hoặc chào bán từ nơi này sang nơi khác

examples: The artist refused to compromise on their vision for commercial success, understanding that no man loves his fetters, be they made of gold.

examples: The experience has widened their horizon and fostered their knowledge in Learning Study.
It's important to foster deep connections with others rather than settling for shallow relationships based on superficial interests.
The school's dedication to providing quality education and fostering a supportive learning environment was showcased in a good light by satisfied parents.
David thought Susan was a loyal employee, but he fostered a snake in his bosom because she had been stealing from the company.
Mike realized he had fostered a viper in his bosom when Emily's behavior caused several other players to become unhappy and ultimately led to her being kicked off the team.

examples: That could one day hamper the efficacy of the COVID vaccine in Israel.

A shell that’s too small hampers growth.
